properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.background-clear-from
properties.description: 背景颜色渐变，开始颜色，默认值lightGray/192,193,193

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.background-clear-to
properties.description: 背景颜色渐变， 结束颜色，默认值white

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.border
properties.description: 边框，默认无

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.border-color
properties.description: 边框颜色，合法值rgb(and optional alpha)或者 white,black,blue，默认值 black

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.border-thickness
properties.description: 边框厚度，合法值>0,默认值为 2

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.char-space
properties.description: 文字间隔，默认值为 6

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.expire-time
properties.description: 验证码过期时间，单位分钟

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.font-color
properties.description: 字体颜色，合法值： r,g,b 或者 white,black,blue，默认值black

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.font-names
properties.description: 字体,默认值Arial, Courier(如果使用中文验证码，则必须使用中文的字体，否则出现乱码)

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.font-size
properties.description: 字体大小，默认值为40px

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.height
properties.description: 图片高度

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.image-format
properties.description: 图片格式

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.length
properties.description: 验证码的位数

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.noise-color
properties.description: 干扰 颜色，合法值： r,g,b 或者 white,black,blue，默认值black

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.resource-text
properties.description: 文本集合，验证码值从此集合中获取,默认值 1234567890

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.image.width
properties.description: 图片宽度

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.background-clear-from
properties.description: 背景颜色渐变，开始颜色，默认值lightGray/192,193,193

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.background-clear-to
properties.description: 背景颜色渐变， 结束颜色，默认值white

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.border
properties.description: 边框，默认无

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.border-color
properties.description: 边框颜色，合法值rgb(and optional alpha)或者 white,black,blue，默认值 black

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.border-thickness
properties.description: 边框厚度，合法值>0,默认值为 2

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.char-space
properties.description: 文字间隔，默认值为 6

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.expire-time
properties.description: 验证码过期时间，单位分钟

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.font-color
properties.description: 字体颜色，合法值： r,g,b 或者 white,black,blue，默认值black

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.font-names
properties.description: 字体,默认值Arial, Courier(如果使用中文验证码，则必须使用中文的字体，否则出现乱码)

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.font-size
properties.description: 字体大小，默认值为40px

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.height
properties.description: 图片高度

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.image-format
properties.description: 图片格式

properties.description: 验证码的位数

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.noise-color
properties.description: 干扰 颜色，合法值： r,g,b 或者 white,black,blue，默认值black

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.resource-text
properties.description: 文本集合，验证码值从此集合中获取,默认值 123456789

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.math.width
properties.description: 图片宽度

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.scan.height
properties.description: 二维码高度

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.scan.margin
properties.description: 二维码外边距，0到4

properties.name: com.openbytecode.captcha.scan.width
properties.description: 二维码宽度
